column4:
SELECT * FROM table1
INNER JOIN table2 ON
table1.column =
table2.column;
column5:
SELECT * FROM employees
INNER JOIN departments ON
employees.department_id =
departments.id;

column4:
SELECT * FROM table1 LEFT
JOIN table2 ON
table1.column =
table2.column;
column5:
SELECT * FROM employees LEFT
JOIN departments ON
employees.department_id =
departments.id;

column4:
SELECT * FROM table1
RIGHT JOIN table2 ON
table1.column =
table2.column;
column5:
SELECT *
FROM employees
RIGHT JOIN departments
ON employees.department_id =
departments.department_id;

column4:
SELECT * FROM table1 FULL
JOIN table2 ON
table1.column =
table2.column;
column5:
SELECT *
FROM employees
LEFT JOIN departments ON
employees.employee_id =
departments.employee_id
UNION
SELECT *
FROM employees
RIGHT JOIN departments ON
employees.employee_id =
departments.employee_id;

column4:
SELECT * FROM table1
CROSS JOIN table2;
column5:
SELECT * FROM employees
CROSS JOIN departments;

SELECT * FROM employees t1,
employees t2
WHERE t1.employee_id =
t2.employee_id;

column4:
SELECT * FROM table1
NATURAL JOIN table2;
column5:
SELECT * FROM employees
NATURAL JOIN departments;
